name: S&H Drifty's Jam
description:
This is a game is a submission for Driftwood's 5 Minutes Game Jam.

Once you select "New Game", you'll use 2  main characters. Suzuki the Red Guy and Harris the Green Guy.

Once enter the map, the time countdown start. You have 5 minutes to reach the 'Yellow Checkpoint'. 

You'll face various enemies but you'll given weapons, skills and member to face the obstacles.

Good luck and enjoy.

Changelog: 

4th May 2018 : Uploaded the same game but fix the customs animation.
